#summary Rule Function > Equip Location

= equip( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments matches an items equip location


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to match

== Remarks ==
  * the item equip location can be found on the debug info menu for that item
  * if no arguments are passed then it will return "true" if the item can be equipped (does not take into account class, skill or level restrictions)

== Examples ==

`equip( trinket ) and soulbound()`

`equip( finger )`

`equip()`
